Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Barterlly will support Hush and will open soon, keep an eye on it: https://twitter.com/barterlly

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> HUSH, to my knowledge, will be the very first coin to have a pure Sapling-only chain. We are the first!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> i wasn't really sure, but it's the case. We start with Sapling from block 1, no Sprout technical debt üéâ

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and we will have a tiny tiny blockchain of a few megabytes at first, super super fast to sync a full node!!! This is good to get lots of people using full node wallets, before our blockchain is big and bulky

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> This is SUPER IMPORTANT, because of things like this: https://z.cash/support/security/announcements/security-announcement-2019-03-19/

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> That bug means that an attacker could make your node THINK (print out) that they sent you more funds than they actually did, but if you tried to spend them it would fail. It's a pretty bad bug in Sprout

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Sprout was not designed well and we will be so lucky to rid ourselves of it completely, very soon

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <heguli97> Nice, i'm looking forward to using the new chain and get a full node going :hush_white:

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <hellcatz - LuckPool> `-rescan`  of course fixed it, but yeah...pain in ....
